post_title: Lefty Leifield Batting w/2 factory #s PSA 4
post_content:
For Sale T206 -Lefty Leifield batting PSA 4 .
The Overprint that covers the factory # 30 missed its mark and Both Sweet Caporal factory #s 30 and # 42 are visible. Very Cool card.

$225.00 plus $5.00 shipping with tracking .
